PV.comment: Calculated with FLEXPART v9; the unit is 1 PVU = 1e-6 K m2 kg-1 s-1; available only on altitudes with air pressure below 90% of surface pressure

press_PV.long_name: Air pressure at the highest location with a given value of potential vorticity

press_PV1_5.long_name: Air pressure at the highest location with value of potential vorticity 1.5 PVU

press_PV2_0.long_name: Air pressure at the highest location with value of potential vorticity 2.0 PVU

press_PV3_0.long_name: Air pressure at the highest location with value of potential vorticity 3.0 PVU

press_PV4_0.long_name: Air pressure at the highest location with value of potential vorticity 4.0 PVU

press_PV6_0.long_name: Air pressure at the highest location with value of potential vorticity 6.0 PVU

press_PV8_0.long_name: Air pressure at the highest location with value of potential vorticity 8.0 PVU

geo_region.comment: here put a reference which explains the regions' codes/labels, shows the regions on the map, etc.

CO_GFAS.long_name: Carbon monoxide mixing ratio in air originating from a region modelled using GFAS version 1.2 PRM with injection profile (hmean) biomass burning emissions

CO_GFAS_1_0_prm.long_name: Carbon monoxide mixing ratio in air originating from a region modelled using GFAS version 1.0 PRM with injection profile (prm) biomass burning emissions

CO_GFED.long_name: Carbon monoxide mixing ratio in air originating from a region modelled using GFED4 using MIXED injection profile (prm) biomass burning emissions

CO_MACC.long_name: Carbon monoxide mixing ratio in air originating from a region modelled using MACCITY anthropogenic (0-1000m) emissions

CO_GFAS_AUST.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Australia and Oceania with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_BOAS.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Boreal Asia with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_BONA.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Boreal North America with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_CEAM.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Central America and Mexico with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_CEAS.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Central Asia with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_EQAS.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Equatorial Asia with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_EURO.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Europe with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_MIDE.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Middle East with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_NHAF.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Northern Hemisphere Africa with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_NHSA.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Northern Hemisphere South America with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_SEAS.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Southeast Asia with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_SHAF.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Southern Hemisphere Africa with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_SHSA.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Southern Hemisphere South America with GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_TOTAL.long_name: Carbon monoxide mixing ratio from GFAS version 1.2 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on altitude plume top provided in GFAS v1.2 at 0.1 deg; cf. Remy et al., 2017)

CO_GFAS_1_0_prm_AUST.long_name: Carbon monoxide contribution from Australia and Oceania with GFAS version 1.0 biomass burning emissions (injection heights are based on MIXED methodology; cf. Sauvage et al., 2017)

surface_press.comment: Model data; interpolated from the surface pressure ECMWF parameter (id=134)

vert_wind_speed.comment: Model data; calculated from the vertical velocity (omega) ECMWF parameter (id=135)

air_pot_temp.comment: Model data; calculated from the temperature ECMWF parameter (id=130)

orog.comment: Model data; calculated from the geopotential ECMWF parameter at the surface (id=129)

geopot_ht.comment: Model data; calculated from the geopotential ECMWF parameter at 500 hPa (id=129)

zPBL.comment: Model data; interpolated from the boundary layer height ECMWF parameter (id=159)
